mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, x.* FROM (SELECT p.PRO_NO, p.PRO_STITLE, p.PRO_GPRICE, p.PRO_THUMBNAIL_PATH, p.PRO_IMG_PATH, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PRO_CLOSE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(PRO_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS PRO_CLOSE_DT, p.PRO_HASHTAG, sum(p2.PAYMENT_PRICE) AS pro_status FROM PROJECT p, ORDERS o, PAYMENT p2 WHERE p.PRO_NO = o.PRO_NO AND o.ORDER_NO = p2.ORDER_NO AND p.PRO_CATENO = '4' GROUP BY p.PRO_NO, p.PRO_STITLE, p.PRO_GPRICE, p.PRO_THUMBNAIL_PATH, p.PRO_IMG_PATH, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PRO_CLOSE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(PRO_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')), p.PRO_HASHTAG ORDER BY p.PRO_NO) x) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 4

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, x.* FROM (SELECT p.PRO_NO, p.PRO_STITLE, p.PRO_GPRICE, p.PRO_THUMBNAIL_PATH, p.PRO_IMG_PATH, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PRO_CLOSE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(PRO_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS PRO_CLOSE_DT, p.PRO_HASHTAG, sum(p2.PAYMENT_PRICE) AS pro_status FROM PROJECT p, ORDERS o, PAYMENT p2 WHERE p.PRO_NO = o.PRO_NO AND o.ORDER_NO = p2.ORDER_NO AND p.PRO_CATENO = '2' GROUP BY p.PRO_NO, p.PRO_STITLE, p.PRO_GPRICE, p.PRO_THUMBNAIL_PATH, p.PRO_IMG_PATH, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PRO_CLOSE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(PRO_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')), p.PRO_HASHTAG ORDER BY p.PRO_NO) x) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 4

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, x.* FROM (SELECT p.PRO_NO, p.PRO_STITLE, p.PRO_GPRICE, p.PRO_THUMBNAIL_PATH, p.PRO_IMG_PATH, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PRO_CLOSE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(PRO_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS PRO_CLOSE_DT, p.PRO_HASHTAG, sum(p2.PAYMENT_PRICE) AS pro_status FROM PROJECT p, ORDERS o, PAYMENT p2 WHERE p.PRO_NO = o.PRO_NO AND o.ORDER_NO = p2.ORDER_NO AND p.PRO_CATENO = '5' GROUP BY p.PRO_NO, p.PRO_STITLE, p.PRO_GPRICE, p.PRO_THUMBNAIL_PATH, p.PRO_IMG_PATH, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PRO_CLOSE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(PRO_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')), p.PRO_HASHTAG ORDER BY p.PRO_NO) x) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 4

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, x.* FROM (SELECT p.PRO_NO, p.PRO_STITLE, p.PRO_GPRICE, p.PRO_THUMBNAIL_PATH, p.PRO_IMG_PATH, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PRO_CLOSE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(PRO_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS PRO_CLOSE_DT, p.PRO_HASHTAG, sum(p2.PAYMENT_PRICE) AS pro_status FROM PROJECT p, ORDERS o, PAYMENT p2 WHERE p.PRO_NO = o.PRO_NO AND o.ORDER_NO = p2.ORDER_NO GROUP BY p.PRO_NO, p.PRO_STITLE, p.PRO_GPRICE, p.PRO_THUMBNAIL_PATH, p.PRO_IMG_PATH, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PRO_CLOSE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(PRO_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')), p.PRO_HASHTAG ORDER BY p.PRO_NO) x) WHERE PRO_STITLE LIKE '%'||#{pro_stitle}||'%'
SELECT P.*, PC.PRO_CATENAME, C.COMPANY_NAME FROM PROJECT P INNER JOIN COMPANY C ON P.USER_NO = C.USER_NO INNER JOIN PROJECT_CATEGORY PC ON P.PRO_CATENO = PC.PRO_CATENO WHERE P.PRO_NO = #{pro_no}
SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM GOODS_RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT G.* FROM PROJECT P INNER JOIN GOODS G ON P.PRO_NO = G.PRO_NO WHERE P.PRO_NO = #{pro_no})A ORDER BY GOODS_PRICE)
SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM GOODS_RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM GOODS WHERE PRO_NO = #{pro_no})A) WHERE GOODS_RNUM = #{goods_rnum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ORDERS O INNER JOIN ORDER_DETAIL D ON O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO WHERE PRO_NO = #{pro_no} ORDER BY O.ORDER_NO
SELECT SUM(PAYMENT_PRICE) FROM ORDERS O INNER JOIN ORDER_DETAIL D ON O.ORDER_NO = D.ORDER_NO INNER JOIN PAYMENT P ON O.ORDER_NO = P.ORDER_NO WHERE PRO_NO = #{pro_no} ORDER BY O.ORDER_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISHLIST WHERE PRO_NO = #{pro_no}

SELECT U.USER_NAME, O.PRIVATE_NAME, P.PAYMENT_PRICE FROM PROJECT P INNER JOIN ORDERS O ON P.PRO_NO = O.PRO_NO INNER JOIN USERS U ON O.USER_NO = U.USER_NO INNER JOIN PAYMENT P ON P.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO WHERE P.PRO_NO = #{pro_no}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, x.* FROM (SELECT p.PRO_NO, p.PRO_STITLE, p.PRO_GPRICE, p.PRO_THUMBNAIL_PATH, p.PRO_IMG_PATH, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PRO_CLOSE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(PRO_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS PRO_CLOSE_DT, p.PRO_HASHTAG, sum(p2.PAYMENT_PRICE) AS pro_status FROM PROJECT p, ORDERS o, PAYMENT p2 WHERE p.PRO_NO = o.PRO_NO AND o.ORDER_NO = p2.ORDER_NO AND p.PRO_CATENO = #{pro_cateno} GROUP BY p.PRO_NO, p.PRO_STITLE, p.PRO_GPRICE, p.PRO_THUMBNAIL_PATH, p.PRO_IMG_PATH, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(PRO_CLOSE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE(PRO_START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD')), p.PRO_HASHTAG ORDER BY p.PRO_NO) x) WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 20
